alert.note: Alert for Four Corners, Upper Dolores River (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 2:29PM MST until February 24 at 8:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST FRIDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 6500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Four Corners/Upper Dolores River. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially in open areas. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
